Ladbrokes Sports Betting App - SportsBook

Published on 22 Mar 2024 by Suresh Babu

Photoshop HTML5 CSS3 JavaScript jQuery PHP

In the fast-paced world of online betting, our focus was on delivering seamless user experiences and enhancing accessibility across devices.

Delving into the World of Online Betting:

My role as a Senior Graphic Designer from August 2013 to April 2014 placed me at the forefront of the Ladbrokes SBBAU project. SportsBook, an online betting application catering to a wide array of sports enthusiasts, offered a platform for engaging in diverse betting activities spanning horse racing, football, tennis, greyhounds, golf, and cricket.

In the fast-paced world of online betting, our focus was on delivering seamless user experiences and enhancing accessibility across devices.

Responsibilities Extended Beyond Design:

While my primary role centered on graphic design, my responsibilities expanded to encompass frontend development coordination and the implementation of new functionalities. I took charge of design specifications and resolved priority one (Pri1) issues promptly, ensuring minimal disruption to project timelines.

Driving Performance and Innovation:

A crucial aspect of my role involved driving performance optimization and innovation within the project. By conducting meticulous performance tuning on JavaScript plugins and leveraging JavaScript frameworks, I contributed to enhancing page loading speed and overall performance while introducing new functionalities seamlessly.

Client Interaction and Support: Maintaining round-the-clock support for priority one and two issues, I actively engaged with clients on technical queries related to UI design. By offering insights and suggesting approaches for implementing responsiveness, I fostered collaborative client relationships and ensured prompt issue resolution.

Client satisfaction was paramount, and I ensured continuous support for priority one and two issues, while actively collaborating with clients to address technical queries and implement responsive design solutions.

Ownership and Quality Assurance: Demonstrating ownership across CSS, JavaScript libraries, and images, I upheld stringent standards of code quality and consistency. Additionally, I prepared comprehensive UI design flow documents and style guides, facilitating adherence to project standards and ensuring a cohesive user experience.

"My commitment to quality extended to meticulous code management and the preparation of UI design flow documents and style guides, ensuring consistency and adherence to project standards."
